alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:09AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Texas, northwestern Hansford and northeastern Sherman Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1209 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Griggs, or 22 miles north of Stratford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goodwell, Eva and Texhoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
